text: @CNN I love brave @VP now can we get @realDonaldTrump to shake his hand right after leaving or even visit himself. What kind of idiot (head of Coronavirus task force) visits infected patients without protection? The doctors have it on their clothing, hangs in the air for up 6 hours!
